FuncDef:
The holdoff-timer command sets the Holdoff timer of an ERPS ring.
The undo holdoff-timer command restores the default value of the Holdoff timer. The holdoff-timer command sets the Holdoff timer of an ERPS ring. The undo holdoff-timer command restores the default value of the Holdoff timer. By default, the Holdoff timer is 0 for the ERPS ring. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the value of the Holdoff timer for the ERPS ring.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 100, in hundred milliseconds.
